name: BRICK BREAKER-Corona Edition
description:
This is a brick breaker game  with 10 levels. Only 10% manage to reach the last level.

Don't forget to collect the POWERUPS .

POWERDOWN-Corona Virus (NOT KIDDING).

IMP: IF YOU ARE PLAYING IN CHROME . 

1) USE CHROME ZOOM FEATURE FROM DEFAULT 100% TO A SUITABLE SIZE  (125% should do the job. Bigger screens may require to set 150%).

2) THEN CLICK THE FULLSCREEN MODE AT THE BOTTOM RIGHT.

HINT: To reach the last level : work HARD , dont give up and don't catch Corona .

Open for constructive feedbacks :)
